moves.name: Last Resort
moves.description: This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.

moves.name: Snatch
moves.description: The user steals the effects of any healing or stat-changing move the opponent attempts to use.

moves.name: Lick
moves.description: The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Metronome
moves.description: The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain into randomly using nearly any move.

moves.name: Odor Sleuth
moves.description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit with Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Defense Curl
moves.description: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.

moves.name: Amnesia
moves.description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Lick
moves.description: The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Chip Away
moves.description: Looking for an opening, the user strikes continually. The target's stat changes don't affect this attack's damage.

moves.name: Screech
moves.description: An earsplitting screech harshly reduces the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Body Slam
moves.description: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Stockpile
moves.description: The user charges up power and raises both its Defense and Sp. Def. The move can be used three times.

moves.name: Swallow
moves.description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to heal its HP. Storing more power heals more HP.

moves.name: Rollout
moves.description: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.

moves.name: Fling
moves.description: The user flings its held item at the target to attack. Its power and effects depend on the item.

moves.name: Belly Drum
moves.description: The user maximizes its Attack stat in exchange for HP equal to half its max HP.

moves.name: Natural Gift
moves.description: The user draws power to attack by using its held Berry. The Berry determines its type and power.

moves.name: Snatch
moves.description: The user steals the effects of any healing or stat-changing move the opponent attempts to use.

moves.name: Last Resort
moves.description: This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.
